publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2221# Irene Oldfather: European Day of Languagesâ€”That the Parliament welcomes European Day of Languages and the publication of Citizens of a Multilingual World by the Action Group for Languages, which makes recommendations on the future provision of language education in schools; recognises the vital role of language education in promoting cultural awareness; notes the positive response to the report, and looks forward to innovation in language teaching and an expansion of opportunities in primary schools.
S1M-2221# European Day of Languages (lodged on 14 September 2001) Tommy Sheridan*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2221# European Day of Languages (lodged on 14 September 2001) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S1M-2221# European Day of Languages (lodged on 14 September 2001) Tavish Scott*, Irene McGugan*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2221# European Day of Languages (lodged on 14 September 2001) Cathy Peattie*, Michael Russell*, Rhoda Grant*

S1M-2221# Irene Oldfather: European Day of Languages-That the Parliament welcomes European Day of Languages and the publication of Citizens of a Multilingual World by the Action Group for Languages, which makes recommendations on the future provision of language education in schools; recognises the vital role of language education in promoting cultural awareness; notes the positive response to the report, and looks forward to innovation in language teaching and an expansion of opportunities in primary schools. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Donald Gorrie, Brian Fitzpatrick, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Tavish Scott, Irene McGugan, Mr Keith Raffan, Cathy Peattie, Michael Russell, Rhoda Grant, Elaine Smith*, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2221# European Day of Languages (lodged on 14 September 2001) David Mundell*
S1M-2221# European Day of Languages (lodged on 14 September 2001) Alex Neil*
S1M-2221# European Day of Languages (lodged on 14 September 2001) Cathy Jamieson*, Cathie Craigie*, Karen Whitefield*, Ms Sandra White*
